SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that true equality will exist in our community and society at large…”

– Dr. John Morey, High School Assistant Principal @NA_Schools @pointparku @CLE_State https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/true-equality-exists-community-society/
